TRX
Tron Wallet Send Receive Settings
Not available in cold wallet A cold wallet will never connect to the Internet and is only used to sign transactions.

For even greater security, you should also never connect your device to the Internet.

Use another device with the Tron Wallet App and import your public address to have an overview of your wallet and sign transactions from it. You won't be able to make a transaction without your cold wallet. Invalid Address Enter a valid address You can't send to your own address Invalid Amount Please enter an amount between %d and %s Asset: To: Amount: Confirm Transaction Send Sending Sent successfully Sending failed Scan the QR code you want to send to. Scan the QR code of your signed transaction from your cold wallet Confirm Votes Sign to submit Submit Votes submitted successfully Submitting failed Try again later Available: Amount To Asset Private Key Address Account Continue Store the private key and your 24 words recovery phrase securely!
e.g. on a piece of paper in a safe.

Losing both would end access to your account forever! I am aware of the risks New Password New Name Your password is important for every transaction. Without password you won't be able to access your assets through the wallet! Generate Address and Private Key or Public Address Your private key is needed to sign transactions and access your assets Import public address only Use this option when you already created a cold wallet or just want an overview of your account Recovery phrase
Scan your unsigned transaction with your cold wallet device to sign it. I've signed my transaction Scan your signed transaction Scan your signed transaction with your other device to complete your transaction. Remaining Votes: Submit Votes Search Search Scan QR code to get your address or click to copy. Recent Blocks Recent Transactions Scan a transaction QR code to sign it. Balance Token COLD WALLET Receive Balance: Assets: Votes: Last Operation: Produced by Port: IP: Vote Total Votes: Produced: Missed: Last Block: 24 words recovery phrase 24 words recovery phrase Your private key will be recovered using your recovery phrase. Invalid Recovery Phrase Please enter all 24 words of your recovery phrase. Couldn't create transaction.
Check internet connection and node settings Freeze TRX can be frozen to gain Tron Power(TP).
For every TP you get a vote for super delegates and bandwidth based on the ratio to the total frozen amount on the network and yours.
Your TRX will be frozen for 3 days, after which they can be unfrozen.
Unfreezing removes TP's and your bandwidth.
You have 5000 free bandwidth per day.
Unfreeze Confirm Freezing Freeze Freezing Friezed successfully Freezing failed Frozen Confirm Unfreezing Unfreezing Failed Unfreezing Unfreeze successfully Remove Wallet Secret Account Info Connection Confirm Remove Remove You are about to remove this wallet.

Please make sure you have your private key or recovery phrase before removing this wallet, otherwise you will lose your access to your account.

Other wallets will remain You are about to remove this wallet.

You'll only remove your public address, so there is no risk. Removing failed No Access An address only wallet cannot access these information Password Access denied Tron Wallet is a multifunctional wallet for the Tron network. © 2018 Marius Gill All Rights Reserved Participate Confirm Spending Spending failed Spending Spend Spending successfully TP

About
Wallet Settings Block Explorer
About Select Wallet
Full Node Node IP (e.g. 47.254.16.55) Node Port (e.g. 50051) RESET SAVE AND CONNECT Solidity Node Invalid Name Please enter a valid name You already have an wallet with this name Your account name is not the same as that of your wallet.
It is a publicly visible name and can be used, among other things, to compare transactions in order to verify an account more quickly.

Your account name can only be changed once.
Make sure you choose the right name. Setup Account Name At least 8 characters and no whitespaces Public Name Your name is not valid or already in use Missing Votes To get votes you have to freeze some TRX

1 TRX = 1 Vote Saved new node connection Invalid IP or Port Saved new solidity node connection Solidity node connection reset to default Account Creation Transfer Token Transfer Token Vote Multiple Candidates votes reset Votes Candidate Votes Witness Creation Token Creation DeployContract Witness Update Token Participation Account Update Freeze Balance Unfreeze Balance Withdraw Balance CustomContract UNRECOGNIZED duration Couldn't parse transaction No valid contract, check your input. Couldn't open wallet View Transaction? No cannot load in cold wallet Missing name Missing abbreviation Missing URL Missing description Missing supply Missing TRX exchange amount Missing token exchange amount Missing frozen days Missing frozen amount Missing total bandwidth Missing bandwidth per account Supply to small Invalid exchange rate Bandwidth per account can't be greater than the total available bandwidth Start should be in the future End should be after start Not enough TRX Needed: 1024 TRX Creating a token costs 1024 TRX and will be consumed when the transaction is sent to the network and approved.
Continue only if you are aware of this. Account Create Contract Transfer Contract Transfer Asset Contract Vote Asset Contract Vote Witness Contract Witness Create Contract Asset Issue Contract Witness Update Contract Participate Asset Issue Contract Account Update Contract Freeze Balance Contract Unfreeze Balance Contract Withdraw Balance Contract Unfreeze Asset Contract Update Asset Contract Node connection reset to default Participate Create Total Supply: Issuer: Start Time: End Time: Description: Price: Token Amount Costs: USD Max Amount: Max USD: Tron Power For security reasons you should setup a public account name Freeze Amount New frozen TRX: New TP: Bandwidth: Current TP: Frozen TRX: Expires all: Current Bandwidth: Bandwidth Cost: New Bandwidth: NOT ENOUGH BANDWIDTH Get Bandwidth The transaction will cost: Address: Amount: Days: From: To: Token: Cost: Details Name Abbreviation Total Supply Website URL Description Exchange Rate TRX Amount 1 Token = Days Bandwidth Distribution Total Bandwidth Bandwidth per Account Participation Set Start Set End Creating a token will cost 1024 TRX. After issuing the token your account will receive the amount of tokens equal to the total supply. When other users exchange their TRX for tokens then the tokens will be withdrawn from your account and you will receive TRX equal to the specified exchange rate.
